remarks.format:
## 解説
## 例 The following code shows how to attach a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition.Condition> event handler for the current <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeCondition> instance. This code example is part of the ConditionedActivityGroup SDK sample from the SimpleCAGWorkflow.designer.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)][Using ConditionedActivityGroup](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/5a0b7e9e-def5-46b2-acbb-0005e1aff984).
